story.storykicker: Check out what the stars say your day will be like today.
story.storybody:
ARIES{mosimage}

You observe relationships keenly and express yourself in subtle terms. You are individualistic and not ready to make compromises. You can evaluate people and situations swiftly and accurately but need to be gracious. You clear a misunderstanding with a friend. Lucky number 6. Colour blue.

TAURUS{mosimage}

You may have to sacrifice something to gain new perspectives, fresh energy and opportunities, which will prove to be better for you. Be firm about making a change, rather than suffering silently in negative situations. Meditation proves to be therapeutic. Lucky number 12. Colour green.

GEMINI{mosimage}

Personal relationships come together in a loving and surprising way. Be ready to cope with unexpected visitors and houseguests today. You can look forward to a happy, busy and exciting day! Be prepared for change, as you are likely to make a breakthrough. Lucky number 10. Colour rose red.

CANCER{mosimage}

You are multifaceted and tend to deplete energy on too many different situations. Two important matters demand your attention and energy and you feel divided. A Gemini person brings joy in your life. Personal relationships are the silver lining to dark clouds. Lucky number 8. Colour greens.

LEO{mosimage}

You stay with daily routines and established relationships, as you need that familiar rhythm in your life. You need to continue being creative and working hard to maintain the foundation you have built. Be in touch with older relatives as they need your support. Lucky number 10. Colour reds.

VIRGO{mosimage}

You manage business affairs with skill and creativity to achieve financial status and repute. You tend to ignore emotional and spiritual aspects, as you are busy and involved with work. Family and children are able to support you, but need appreciation. Lucky number 14. Colour green.

LIBRA{mosimage}

You gain strength and uphold values and priorities by swimming bravely through troubled waters. You have clarity of mind and look squarely at truths and situations to conquer your fears and adversaries. Relationships need to be resolved one way or the other. Lucky number 1. Colour green.

SCORPIO{mosimage}

'The Princess of Swords' blesses you with youthful energy and intelligence to handle professional matters efficiently today. You are subtle and affectionate in relationships while you need to be more expressive and demonstrative to draw love and warmth. Lucky number 8. Colour pastels.

SAGITTARIUS{mosimage}

You start the day by drawing the 'The Ace of Cups' to celebrate happily with loved ones. New professional opportunities are worth taking as changes prove to be progressive. You indulge in a bit of shopping, frolic and food, which makes this a playful time. Lucky number 1. Color pink.

CAPRICORN{mosimage}

Therapeutic and relaxing pastimes are recommended. Yoga, meditation and healthy diets can work wonders for you. You are laborious and clever with money matters. You maintain relationships that are steady and deep. Children need your support and guidance. Lucky number 14. Colour greens.

AQUARIUS{mosimage}

Intelligent handling of resources and management of forces is beneficial and fortunate today! Prudence and care in all things is advisable. Loving relationships should be treated with tender, loving care. Children bring joy and the family unites to celebrate. Lucky number 8. Colour red.

PISCES{mosimage}

Be positive and practical rather than over analytical and negative. You are delicate yet courageous in difficult assignments. Don't frighten people away with your temper, stop fighting and let in some love and fresh energy. A playful attitude is recommended. Lucky number 9. Colour blue.
